Know O Muhammad that when I take the soul of the son of Adam and his family member cries out, I stand at the side of the house with his soul and say: What is this crying? If you are pleased with what Allah does and you are patient, you will be rewarded. If you are impatient and displeased, you will sin and be burdened. You have no complaint against us.
